entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
